idea-plugin.name: Base16 Pico
idea-plugin.vendor: PICO-8 (http://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Pico for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by PICO-8 (http://www.lexaloffle.com/pico-8.php). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
